entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Smiths Falls

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain in the morning then to periods of rain in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
